arts.ttl: Bristol Rovers ease the pressure on Matt Taylor with victory over Charlton
arts.sum: James Wilson scored the crucial goal for the Pirates.

arts.ttl: Birmingham City captain makes League One claim - with Charlton Athletic visit coming up
arts.sum: Birmingham also broke the League One record by signing Jay Stansfield from Fulham for a fee in excess of £10million. Chris Davies’ side have won six of their opening seven League One games after being relegated from the Championship last season.

arts.ttl: Midfielder returns: Charlton Athletic team news and predicted XI to face Bristol Rovers

arts.ttl: Matt Taylor hoping Charlton Athletic visit will change Bristol Rovers’ League One fortunes after ‘brutal’ September
arts.sum: We hope we can have a better October than September – it’s a pretty brutal month. Bristol Rovers boss Matt Taylor is hoping Tuesday’s League One home clash with Charlton will present a fresh opportunity for his side after a ‘brutal’ September.
